name: Robot Is Powerless
description:
Humanity’s doom has finally come. The robots have enslaved all of the remaining humans. All of them? Don’t be so sure of that! We are a small group of rebels trying desperately to put an end to the robot’s reign. LD3-9RIP, one of our own robots, succeeded in infiltrating the enemy’s main power plant. Now he just has to get to the core and sabotage it without getting spotted! 

I just hope he doesn’t run out of power …

Move LD3-9RIP using the arrow keys (or WASD keys)

Press Space to wait for one turn

Press R to restart the level

PS: The screen will just go black at the end of the game, sorry about that (not a bug! just a feature ;) )
